name: feather-dance
effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by two stages.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user covers the foe with a mass of down that sharply lowers the Attack stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The user covers the foe with a mass of down that sharply lowers the Attack stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user covers the foe with a mass of down that sharply lowers the Attack stat.
